summary: The PHP SDK needs to implement a test server downloader that uses the temporal.download service to automatically download and extract temporalite or temporal-test-server binaries based on platform, architecture, and SDK version parameters.
userImpact: Users will be able to automatically download and run appropriate test servers for their platform without manual setup.
proposedFix: Integrate with temporal.download API endpoint to fetch server artifacts with query parameters for platform, arch, sdk-name, and sdk-version, then extract and run the binary.
keyQuote: temporal.download/{artifact_name}/{version_name} where {artifact_name} is temporalite or temporal-test-sever and {version_name} is default or a version name
